tha-ap491:7.3: Ānando nāma nāmena → ānando nāmupaṭṭhāko (bj, s2, s3)
tha-ap491:16.1: Akariṃ ānantariyaṃ → akariṃnantariyañca (s2, s3, mr) | akarimanantariyañca (pts1)
tha-ap491:24.4: nirupamaṃ viggahaṃ → nirūpamaviggahaṃ (bj) | nirūpamaggahaṃ (si) | nirūpamaṃ viggahaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap491:30.1: dhammaruciyo thero → dhammarucitthero (bj) | dhammaruci thero (s2, s3, pts1)
